001package net.tvburger.jdl.linear.optimizer;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.*;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.FeatureMatrices;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.LinearBasisFunctionModel;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Optimizer;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.UpdateStep;
011
012public class L2RegularizedClosedSolutionOptimizer<N extends Number> implements LinearModelOptimizer<N> {
013
014    private boolean debugOutput;
015    private N lambda;
016
017    private final JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport;
018
019    public L2RegularizedClosedSolutionOptimizer(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport) {
020        this.typeSupport = typeSupport;
021    }
022
023    @Override
024    public JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> getCurrentNumberType() {
025        return typeSupport;
026    }
027
028    public N getLambda() {
029        return lambda;
030    }
031
032    public void setLambda(N lambda) {
033        this.lambda = lambda;
034    }
035
036    public boolean isDebugOutput() {
037        return debugOutput;
038    }
039
040    public void setDebugOutput(boolean debugOutput) {
041        this.debugOutput = debugOutput;
042    }
043
044    @Override
045    public void setOptimalWeights(LinearBasisFunctionModel<N> regression, DataSet<N> trainingSet) {
046        JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport = regression.getCurrentNumberType();
047        if (debugOutput) {
048            System.out.println("Number type = " + typeSupport.name());
049        }
050
051        N[] values = typeSupport.createArray(trainingSet.size());
052        for (int i = 0; i < values.length; i++) {
053            values[i] = trainingSet.samples().get(i).targetOutputs()[0];
054        }
055        TypedVector<N> y = Vectors.of(typeSupport, values).transpose();
056        if (debugOutput) {
057            y.print("y");
058        }
059        Matrix<N> designMatrix = FeatureMatrices.create(regression.getFeatureExtractor(), trainingSet);
060        if (debugOutput) {
061            designMatrix.print("Φ");
062        }
063
064        Matrix<N> transposedDesignMatrix = designMatrix.transpose();
065
066        Matrix<N> regularizedInvertedDesignMatrix = transposedDesignMatrix
067                .multiply(designMatrix)
068                .add(Matrices.identity(designMatrix.m(), typeSupport)
069                        .multiply(lambda))
070                .invert()
071                .multiply(transposedDesignMatrix);
072        if (debugOutput) {
073            regularizedInvertedDesignMatrix.print("(Φ" + Notations.TRANSPOSED + "Φ + " + Notations.LAMBDA + "I)" + Notations.INVERSE);
074        }
075
076        Vector<N> weights = regularizedInvertedDesignMatrix.multiply(y);
077        if (debugOutput) {
078            weights.print("w");
079        }
080
081        for (int i = 0; i < weights.getDimensions(); i++) {
082            regression.setParameter(i, weights.get(i + 1));
083        }
084    }
085
086}
